description: Track task progress with status indicators and filtering

userStories.title: Add Status type to Task interface
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to define task status types for type safety.
acceptanceCriteria: Add optional status field to Task interface with default 'pending'

userStories.title: Create StatusBadge component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see task status at a glance.

userStories.title: Add status toggle to TaskCard
userStories.description: As a user, I want to change task status directly from the card.
acceptanceCriteria: Add status dropdown or toggle control

userStories.title: Create StatusFilter component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter the list to see only certain statuses.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter options: All | Pending | In Progress | Done

userStories.title: Integrate StatusFilter into TaskList
userStories.description: As a user, I want the task list to respond to my filter selection.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter component appears above task list
Selecting a filter shows only matching tasks
